title: #150: Hypocrazy
description:
The third book, Hypocrazy: Surviving In A World Of Cultural Double-Standards, is complete and just about ready to go to the printers. This episode gives a little sneak peek into what to expect and who should hide in their basements.

The eight areas of focus are: Woke, Wars, Media, Society, Beliefs, COVID, Business, and Government, with each topic showcasing their own version of hypocrisy, along with many examples of their questionable behavior and the footnotes to prove it.

This podcast has always gone after the sacred cows, but Hypocrazy grills them up and serves them at the BBQ with chips and a drink.
